*div1 type="summary"* *p*Henry Morse to James F. Perry, August 5, 1832. Details of military movements.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Halls Bayou */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="08-05-1832">August 5, 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Mr. Perry*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Sir, I am just from *location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned*where on *date_mentioned n="08-03-1832">Friday morning*/date_mentioned* I saw *person_mentioned*Captain John Austin*/person_mentioned* who had just returned from *location_mentioned*Anahac*/location_mentioned* reports that the *location_mentioned*Fort */location_mentioned*at that place was dismantled and the *person_mentioned*Troops*/person_mentioned* embarked for the *location_mentioned*westward */location_mentioned*and the *person_mentioned*fleet */person_mentioned*gone back to *location_mentioned*Matamoros*/location_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Colonel Mexia*/person_mentioned* had not marched on *location_mentioned*Nachidoch */location_mentioned*on account of the scarcity of provisions nor had he heard from them he however left it with the *person_mentioned*Americans */person_mentioned*to send *person_mentioned*Col. Pedras */person_mentioned*on to the *location_mentioned*Westward*/location_mentioned* a *person_mentioned*prisoner*/person_mentioned*, to take him without bloodshed if possible, if not, to use forca Poor *person_mentioned*Bradburn */person_mentioned*had crossed the *location_mentioned*Sabine*/location_mentioned*. There were eight *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned*in pursuit of him and had come so close upon him that they had got his Horse, he swam the *location_mentioned*river above the ferry*/location_mentioned* and had got on *location_mentioned*eight miles beyond*/location_mentioned* on foot, the men still in persuit and it was supposed had overtaken him, *person_mentioned*Captain Austin*/person_mentioned* learned that at the time the *person_mentioned*Americans */person_mentioned*were before *location_mentioned*Anahac */location_mentioned*There were four *person_mentioned*Mexicans*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*killed */person_mentioned*and four *person_mentioned*wounded*/person_mentioned*, The *person_mentioned*troops */person_mentioned*from two or three other *location_mentioned*stations */location_mentioned*had commenced their march to the *location_mentioned*westward*/location_mentioned*. Have you heard of the death of *person_mentioned*Mrs. Henry Austin*/person_mentioned*? she died on *date_mentioned n="08-02-1832">Thursday*/date_mentioned* morning and was buryed the *date_mentioned n="08-03-1832">following day*/date_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Captain Austin*/person_mentioned* was very much afflicted with his loss, *person_mentioned*Mr Jimmison of *location_mentioned*Brazoria*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* died early last week and there was much sickness in and about the *location_mentioned*Town*/location_mentioned*. We may congratulate ourselves on good health out here if nothing else, *person_mentioned*Mr Harris*/person_mentioned* informed me as I passed there *date_mentioned n="08-04-1832">last evening */date_mentioned*that a *person_mentioned*Gentleman */person_mentioned*right from *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned* had passed there and reports that a terible *person_mentioned*Indian */person_mentioned*War had broken out about *location_mentioned*Rock Island on the upper Mississippi*/location_mentioned* and the *location_mentioned*borders of Indiana*/location_mentioned*, considerable fighting had taken place and that the *person_mentioned*Indians */person_mentioned*had committed a great deal of mischief in the Murdering of *person_mentioned*families*/person_mentioned*. It seems that a good many *person_mentioned*tribes */person_mentioned*had joined in the war, such as the *person_mentioned*Winibagas */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Sock */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Foxes*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Soux */person_mentioned*etc.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Henry Morse*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Should you learn that *person_mentioned*Col. Austin*/person_mentioned* does not intend to visit you and a chance offers to send him my letter I would be glad you would do so—*/p*
*p*[Address:]*person_mentioned* Mr James F. Perry*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Oak Grove*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
